text: František Derfler (12 November 1942 – 17 August 2019) was a Czech actor, educator and political activist. He was born in Prague. He was a professor of divisions.František Derfler na Dabingforum.cz In November 1989 he co-founded the local Civic Forum in Brno and became its spokesperson.Zemřela legenda rozhlasu a signatář Charty 77. Zakládal Občanské fórum He was one of the signers of Charter 77. Derfler died on 17 August 2019 in Prague at the age of 76.Zemřel brněnský herec a režisér František Derfler, signatář Charty 77 ==References== ==Other websites== * *František Derfler on ČSFD Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Czech academics Category:Czech politicians Category:Charter 77 signatories Category:Actors from Prague
title: František Derfler
